snippet: The Ancash State regional health office said 140 people were treated for “irritative symptoms caused by the inhalation of toxins,” after a pipeline carrying the concentrate under high pressure burst open in their community.
lead_paragraph: The Ancash State regional health office said 140 people were treated for “irritative symptoms caused by the inhalation of toxins,” after a pipeline carrying the concentrate under high pressure burst open in their community.

headline.main: Peru: More Than 100 Sickened by Toxic Spill at Mine
headline.print_headline: Peru: More Than 100 Sickened by Toxic Spill at Mine
